helpdesk.title: Helpdesk & Support
helpdesk.intro: Submit a support ticket or track your existing requests for technical, account, or general issues. Our team is here to help!
helpdesk.submitRequestDesc: Report a problem, request support, or get help with our services.
helpdesk.trackReportDesc: Check the status and details of your submitted support tickets.
helpdesk.submitTicketDesc: Fill in the form below to report your issue. You will receive a ticket number after submission.
helpdesk.ticketSubmittedDesc: Your support ticket has been submitted and is being processed.
helpdesk.subject: Subject
helpdesk.trackTicketDesc: Enter your ticket number to view the status and details of your support request.

ntb.title: Report & Track NTB Issues
ntb.intro: Report Non-Tariff Barrier issues or track existing reports with our streamlined platform.
ntb.reportNTBIssueDesc: Submit a new Non-Tariff Barrier report with detailed information.
ntb.e_g_DelayInClearingCargoAtPort: e.g., Delay in clearing cargo at port
ntb.reportSubmittedDesc: Your NTB report has been submitted and is being processed.
ntb.trackNTB: Enter your tracking code to check status the NTB Report you submitted.
ntb.trackNTBDesc: Check the status and feedback of your submitted NTB reports.
ntb.submitNTBDesc: Fill in the form below to report your NTB issue. You will receive a tracking code after submission.
ntb.ntbSubmittedDesc: Your NTB report has been submitted and is being processed.
ntb.subject: Subject
ntb.submitNTB: Report any non-tariff barrier you encounter. Fill out the form with detailed information about the issue.
